Publication.source: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A 80(15);4629-33
Publication.title: The carB gene of Escherichia coli: a duplicated gene coding for the large subunit of carbamoyl-phosphate synthetase.
Publication.author: Nyunoya H
Lusty CJ

Evidence-Code.comment: Traceable author statement. The assertion was made in a publication -- such as a review or in another database -- that itself did not describe an experiment supporting the assertion. The statement referenced another publication that supported the assertion, but it is unclear whether that publication described an experiment that supported the assertion. The difference between the codes EV-EXP-TAS and EV-AS-TAS is that the former code is used when it is certain that experimental evidence supports the assertion, and the latter code is used when there is a possibility that an experiment was not done to support the assertion. In general, references to the primary literature are preferred, but this code can be used when the original article is difficult to locate.
